thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: INCREDIBLE customer service!!!!
thread.title_full: INCREDIBLE customer service!!!! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: E.C. M
title: INCREDIBLE customer service!!!!
text:
My stuffed elephant was accidentally caught up in the sheets and taken to their laundry service. The hotel was so kind- they felt awful about the accident and had the stuffed animal mailed back to my home. I really appreciate everything they did. This hotel is in a great location and has employees who truly care about their guests.
Room Tip: great location See more room tips Green Features: did not recycle, washed sheets and towels every day
